Victor Jiao

Profile Projects Blog

Hi, I'm Victor Jiao. I'm currently a student at the University of Chicago, aiming to graduate in 2018 with a BS in Computer Science. In my free time, I love solving problems, going to hackathons, making cool things, and singing a cappella.

Projects of various degrees of completion

Starlorn - a space-themed bullet-hell game, where you play as a defending spaceship destroying opponents with strange, blue-glowy bullets whilst simultaneously dodging enemy ammunition. team members: me , Ben Kurtovic , Josh Hofing

Neighborhood - An app that helps you reach out to your neighbors in events and posts with a geo-centric system.

LeapAudio - An app that uses the LeapMotion to generate chords based on certain gestures.

Oriadnos - A texture mapper made from scratch with C/C++ and SDL and per- pixel access. team members: me , Ben Kurtovic

terminvaders - A terminal space shooter game with multiplayer capabilities. * Currently, the rendering for the menu needs to be fixed, but the game works otherwise. team members: me , Ben Kurtovic

databanks - A terminal data handler that retrieves and stores information as "index cards", complete with a find function and polished GUI. team members: me , Ben Kurtovic
